title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 258.10 - Preservation of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 258.10 - Preservation of records

State Regulations
(a) Notwithstanding the requirements of Parts 292, 293, or Appendix 4-A of this

Title, and
49 CFR
195.404(c), the minimum
period of retention for records necessary to prove compliance with this Part
shall be three years. Longer periods of retention may be mandated by Parts 292, 293, or Appendix 4-A of this Title. (b) Records pertaining to each repair made to
a pipeline shall be maintained for as long as the pipeline remains in
service. (c) All records, or copies
thereof, shall be kept on file in the State of New York and accessible to the
staff of the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
258.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
